options.explain:
Chill stacks +4 when attacking

Frostbloom level +1 for every 20 Chill stacks
- Frostbloom Lv. 1: Max HP +200
- Frostbloom Lv. 2: HP +230.1 per min. and Damage Value +1704

options.explain:
When HP reaches 0, casts Hero's Spirit buff, applying the following effects.
- All HP healing effects negated
- Incoming damage consumes MP instead of HP. Character dies if MP reaches 0.
- MP -2% every sec.
options.explainDetail:
When HP reaches 0, casts Hero's Spirit buff, applying the following effects. (Cooldown: 300 sec.)
- All HP healing effects negated
- Incoming damage consumes MP instead of HP. Character dies if MP reaches 0.
- MP -2% every sec.

options.explain:
Attacks create a 50% chance of creating an orb for 10 sec. that applies the following effects when obtained.
- Black Orb: Attack Speed +8% and Casting Speed +12% for 15 sec.
- White Orb: A barrier by 10% of Max HP for 15 sec.
Obtaining this orb decreases your HP/MP -1% and increases Movement Speed +20% for 15 sec.
options.explainDetail:
Attacks create a 50% chance of creating an orb for 10 sec. that applies the following effects when obtained. (Cooldown: 1 sec.)
- Black Orb: Attack Speed +8% and Casting Speed +12% for 15 sec. (Max Stacks: 3)
- White Orb: A barrier by 10% of Max HP for 15 sec. (Max Stacks: 1)
Obtaining this orb decreases your HP/MP -1% and increases Movement Speed +20% for 15 sec. (Max Stacks: 1)
